amendment.description: Amendment provides an additional $2 million for reduction of the backlog by the Board of Veterans Appeals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $2,000,000 in funding with in the Departmental Administration General Administration in the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Gosar.
